const response = await client.search({
  index: "stackoverflow",
  size: 0,
  query: {
    query_string: {
      query: "tags:kibana OR tags:javascript",
    },
  },
  aggs: {
    sample: {
      sampler: {
        shard_size: 200,
      },
      aggs: {
        keywords: {
          significant_terms: {
            field: "tags",
            exclude: ["kibana", "javascript"],
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
